title: Record Album Sleeve, "Provocative Percussion, Vol. III", 1961
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, gate-fold cardboard, black vinyl 33 1/3 RPM record
provenance: From the collection of Mathew Weaver
creditline: Gift of Mathew Weaver in honor of Lenora J. and Robert J. Weaver
description: A pattern of blue and white dots, based on a grid, are arranged on a solid black field.The title, PROVOCATIVE PERCUSSION, VOL.III are printed in white across the bottom edge. At top right is printed STEREO / RS 821 SD and at top right is the Command Records logo. At bottom left under the title is @1961 Grand Award Record Co., INC. New York N.Y.

tombstone.epitaph:
Record Album Sleeve, "Provocative Percussion, Vol. III", 1961.
1961. Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, gate-fold cardboard, black vinyl 33 1/3 RPM record. Gift of Mathew Weaver in honor of Lenora J. and Robert J. Weaver. 2009-44-4-a/c.
